patterns: where can i register for classes?

responses: Please refer to our Online Classes page!
Our available Zoom classes can be seen on our Online Classes page.
To register for classes, head to the Online Classes page.

patterns: What courses can I do from home?
Where can I find courses to do from home
i want courses i can help my child with
i want courses i can do by myself
give me courses to do from home
responses: We have a variety of courses including: Astronomy, Basics of Coding, Chemistry, and so much more! To see these courses take a look at our Self-Paced Classes page.
Please refer to the Self-Paced Classes page.
To do courses at your own pace, either by yourself or with the help of a parent, take a look at the Self-Paced Classes page.

patterns: I want to donate to STEMz Learning
I want to give STEMz Learning money
responses: To donate, please refer to our Get Involved Page to find our Paypal and Venmo!

patterns: i want to be a teacher or make curriculum
i want to be involved with STEMz Learning
i want to work at STEMz Learning
i'm not in school, can i still be volunteer?
responses: Thank you for your interest in volunteering with STEMz Learning. Please refer to our Get Involved page.
Thanks for your interest in getting involved with STEMz Learning. Please send us a message using our Contact page and we will get back to you shortly.
Our volunteer program is designed for high school and college students. If this isn't you, send us a message and we would love to discuss any opportunities at STEMz Learning for you.
